story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_0100: So you saw a Dynamax Pokémon?
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_0200:
Yeah. Karen, Will, and Morty decided to stay
there so they can keep an eye on things.
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_0300:
Actually, I’ve already received reports of similar
incidents happening.
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_0500: Not a lot...but they’re on the rise.
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_0600:
I already have Red and Blue on the case, as I
thought we should do something soon before it
gets out of hand.
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_0700:
I’m pretty sure I know who’s behind all of
this, too.
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_0900: They were spying on us earlier.
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_1000:
They’ve been spotted lurking around whenever a
Dynamax Pokémon is reported.
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_1100:
But they don’t seem to have any control over those
Pokémon, right?
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_1300: They’re just forcing the Pokémon to Dynamax?
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_1400: Yeah, that’s what I was thinking!
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_1500:
I once saw a Gyarados that had evolved because
Team Rocket forced it...
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_1600:
It went on a rampage and looked like it was in a
lot of pain.
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_1700:
Team Rocket doesn’t care about Pokémon...
They just use them as tools!
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_1800: I won’t let them get away with this.
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_2100: I’m doing this on my own.
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_2200: You don’t want to come with us?
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_2300: I’m not a fan of teaming up.
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_2400:
I don’t want to be like Team Rocket. They’re just a
bunch of weaklings who can’t do anything on
their own.
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_2500: What’s up with him? He seemed a little on edge...
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_2600: Let him go. The rest of us can team up.
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_2700: Sure! But where do we even start?
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_2800: Oh, I know someone you can ask for help!
story_teamrocket_02_04000/2401_1201_2900:
She’s a Pokémon Professor from Galar, home of
the Dynamax phenomenon!
